name: Diabetes Program
short_desc: Provides self-management classes to adults diagnosed with Type 2 diabetes
description: Provides self-management classes to adults diagnosed with Type 2 diabetes. The diabetes team provides education classes, support groups, and develops a treatment plan to assist a person in controlling their diabetes. The 7-week education session is offered in English, Cantonese, Farsi, Hindi, Punjabi, Spanish and Urdu.
